equipment_list_page.first_paragraph: This page represents a list of all equipment that are connected to the hardware system.

table_settings.no_search_results: The search did not returned any records!

ph_sensor.first_paragraph: Here you will find all the readings that pH Sensor has recorded and transmitted to this Web Application via the API. The chart represents the readings evolution in the last 24 hours. The table is displaying all the records, in descending order based on the added date.
ph_sensor.second_paragraph: You can add, modify or delete a record; export to CSV / PDF and see some statistics of this equipment.

ec_sensor.first_paragraph: Here you will find all the readings that EC Sensor has recorded and transmitted to this Web Application via the API. The chart represents the readings evolution in the last 24 hours. The table is displaying all the records, in descending order based on the added date.
ec_sensor.second_paragraph: You can add, modify or delete a record; export to CSV / PDF and see some statistics of this equipment.

level_sensor.first_paragraph: Here you will find all the readings that Level Sensor has recorded and transmitted to this Web Application via the API. The chart represents the readings evolution in the last 24 hours. The table is displaying all the records, in descending order based on the added date.
level_sensor.second_paragraph: You can add, modify or delete a record; export to CSV / PDF and see some statistics of this equipment.

pump1.first_paragraph: Here you will find all the readings that pH-- Pump has recorded and transmitted to this Web Application via the API. The chart represents the readings evolution in the last 24 hours. The table is displaying all the records, in descending order based on the added date.
pump1.second_paragraph: You can add, modify or delete a record; export to CSV / PDF and see some statistics of this equipment.

pump2.first_paragraph: Here you will find all the readings that pH++ Pump has recorded and transmitted to this Web Application via the API. The chart represents the readings evolution in the last 24 hours. The table is displaying all the records, in descending order based on the added date.
pump2.second_paragraph: You can add, modify or delete a record; export to CSV / PDF and see some statistics of this equipment.

pump3.first_paragraph: Here you will find all the readings that Nutrients Pump has recorded and transmitted to this Web Application via the API. The chart represents the readings evolution in the last 24 hours. The table is displaying all the records, in descending order based on the added date.

card_content.paragraph: The Smart Garden web application displays real-time information about the records that the six hardware devices have captured. These equipments are presented below:
